title.narrative: Enhancing the Capacities of the Ministry of Development and International Cooperation

description.narrative: Enhancing the Capacities of the Ministry of Development and International Cooperation and to enhance the national abilities for identifying the fields of development, international cooperation, development, and foreign aid.

document-link.url: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/ARE/Cap bldg Ministry of Dev and Int Coop.pdf

title.narrative: Cap bldg Ministry of Dev and Int Coop pro doc
Cost Sharing Agreement between MICAD and UNDP

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Number of new full-time equivalent jobs created for women 15+ years old
Number of new full-time equivalent jobs created for men 15+ years old
Total number of new full-time equivalent jobs created
Number of additional females benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
Number of additional males benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
Number of additional people benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
Extent to which policies, systems and/or institutional measures are in place at the national and sub-national levels to generate and strengthen employment and livelihoods
Number of additional demonstration schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
Number of additional advocacy and knowledge schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
Number of additional skill-building schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
Number of additional implementation support schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
To enhance the capacities of MICAD , programs and foreign aid in all forms of development programs and evaluating the impact of these programs.
capital of a political entity
policy, planning and administration

UNDP supports DCCE in the publication of annual reports on energy, environment, sustainability and green economy. These in turn help asses Dubai's progress towards consolidating its position as a global hub for sustainability and green economy.
The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Extent to which climate finance is being accessed (by government and non-government institutions)
Extent to which there is a strengthened system in place to access, deliver, monitor, report on and verify climate finance
Extent to which implementation of comprehensive measures - plans, strategies, policies, programmes and budgets - to achieve low-emission and climate-resilient development objectives has improved.

Publication of annual reports on energy, environment, sustainability and green economy. These in turn help asses Dubai's progress towards consolidating its position as a global hub for sustainability and green economy.
first-order administrative division
State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report Produced

comment.narrative: No Existing State of Energy Report in the UAE
Quality Assure, produce and launch two publications in 2015: UAE State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report

The Dubai Green Economy Report 2017 and UAE State of Energy Report 2017 were both quality assured by UNDP and produced. The work for phasing out the project and the preparation of a new project document, scaling up the scope and geographical coverage of publications started
Quality Assure, produce and launch two publications in 2017 (assemble in 2016): UAE State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report and close project

Both reports (Green Economy Report 2017 and State of Energy report 2017 were launched), pending payments were settled, remaining funds on this project were transferred to new output/project with the same partner.

description.narrative: Producing the first national booklet advocating to gender mainstreaming in the government and private sectors
The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Existence of a comprehensive definition of SGBV
Extent to which an adequate framework of SGBV offences, with appropriate criminal penalties that apply to SGBV offences, is in place
Protection and occupation orders available along with enforcement mechanisms
specific duties to prevent and address SGBV imposed on the police and state, including to provide victim services, along with a monitoring mechanism
Regulations containing necessary details for SGBV-related laws to operate enacted
Appropriate budget required to implement and enforce SGBV laws and policies allocated
Existence of new and strengthened police services to prevent and address sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV)
Existence of new and strengthened health and HIV services to prevent and address sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV)
Existence of new and strengthened economic and employment assistance services to prevent and address sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV)
Existence of other new and strengthened services to prevent and address sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV)

title.narrative: Producing the National Gender Gap Report

description.narrative: The project aims at producing a flagship that will address the need for a consistent and comprehensive measure for gender equality that can track a country’s progress over time.
The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Existence of effective mechanisms to collect, disseminate sex disaggregated data and gender statistics, and apply gender analysis

title.narrative: Capacity building of World Green Economy Organisation

description.narrative: UNDP UAE Country Office will provide implementation support services for WGEO to become a fully operational and self-sustaining international organization by 2019.
The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Extent to which climate finance is being accessed (by government and non-government institutions)
Extent to which there is a strengthened system in place to access, deliver, monitor, report on and verify climate finance
Extent to which implementation of comprehensive measures - plans, strategies, policies, programmes and budgets - to achieve low-emission and climate-resilient development objectives has improved.
Building the Capacity of WGEO to fulfill its potential as a Green Economy International Organization by 2019

activity-description.narrative: WGEO to be based in Dubai

description.narrative: Formulation and production of the autonomous National Human Development Report 2017. The report is set to become a key advocacy tool for UAE University and UNDP.
The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Extent to which women's groups have strengthened capacity to engage in critical development and crisis related issues
Extent to which youth groups have strengthened capacity to engage in critical development and crisis related issues
Extent to which relevant excluded groups have strengthened capacity to engage in critical development and crisis related issues
Degree of effectiveness of legal/regulatory framework for women's groups to function in the public sphere and contribute to development
Degree of effectiveness of mechanisms/platforms to engage women's groups
Degree of effectiveness of legal/regulatory framework for youth groups to function in the public sphere and contribute to development
Degree of effectiveness of mechanisms/platforms to engage youth groups
Degree of effectiveness of legal/regulatory framework for excluded groups to function in the public sphere and contribute to development
Degree of effectiveness of mechanisms/platforms to engage excluded groups
Formulation and production of the autonomous National Human Development Report 2017. The report is set to become a key advocacy tool for UAE University and UNDP.
